content: I think that's a great idea! Offering a promotion to customers who share a photo of their summer-themed decor featuring your candles on social media is a fantastic way to encourage engagement, drive brand awareness, and generate user-generated content. Since you participated in the Community Yard Sale on April 17th and had a great experience, you could also consider partnering with other local businesses or influencers in your community to amplify the promotion and reach a wider audience.
